description: Low engagement boredom or apathy - everyday disinterest expressed through drifting attention and impatient fidgeting.
actor_description: My attention keeps sliding off everything in front of me. I try to care and it doesn't stick. Time feels thick. I want to be anywhere else—or at least doing anything that doesn't feel this empty.
description_text: {actor} stares off into the distance, stifling a yawn as their fingers drum impatiently—interest slipping away despite their best attempt to stay present.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a slow exhale and a faint, restless rhythm—tapping, shifting, the sound of someone waiting for life to start again.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: Around {actor} there's a slackened energy—impatience without momentum, like attention has gone loose in the joints.
